title: Tutorial: scikit-learn - Machine Learning in Python
summary:
In this video tutorial from PyData Workshop, scikit-learn contributer Jacob
VanderPlas is going to give you an overview of machine learning in Python
using scikit-learn.

He'll talk about general machine learning concepts, as well as walk you
through a few exercises that demonstrate how you can use machine learning
technology.
